thread.section_title: Blinds 2go Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Blinds 2go | www.blinds-2go.co.uk | 46 of 2268
thread.title: Mrs Lisa Moody
thread.title_full: Blinds 2go reviewed by Mrs Lisa Moody

author: Mrs Lisa Moody
title: Mrs Lisa Moody
text: Wouldn't hesitate to recommend - only criticism was that even though we measured carefully blinds were all slightly smaller than recess so had to pack out slightly to make them fit. Didn't put me off ordering more though - very good quality blinds at good prices. Liked the free sample service and company don't keep hassling you to make a purchase once you have received it. Delivery of blinds was within a week of ordering - excellent service.
